analysis.description:
FlexibleTokenSale.reclaimTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol#755-764) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokens == 0

Reentrancy in FlexibleTokenSale.buyTokensInternal (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol#649-734):
	External calls:
	- saleBalance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol#666-667)
	- userBalance = getUserTokenBalance(_beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol#685-687)
	External calls sending eth:
	- walletAddress.transfer(contribution) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol#718)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalEtherCollected (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol#723)
	- totalTokensSold (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol#719-723)

Reentrancy in BluzelleTokenSale.buyTokensInternal (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol#1009-1014):
	External calls:
	- tokensPurchased = super.buyTokensInternal(_beneficiary,applicableBonus) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountTokensPurchased (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc05e610eaac542bfa64504025413291beb58d36.sol)
